Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: This needs corresponding system tests to be linked and documentation changes (if any) also need to be incorporated. ~denyeart ~jyellick

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~ChristopherFerris Right, we have added system tests and doc items for all the 1.1 alpha items, but not yet for the rest of the 1.1 items. Will be done in bulk.
